hi madam @rica done adding Honeycomb to AU and Global site. should we also add it to the US site? thanks
40mins
@glen could you please work on this? Thanks!

Hey Team,

Can we please get this new product page loaded onto the website - it's called 'Honeycomb'. We could like this to sit under the menu navigation under WoodBeQuiet, and break this out into 2 'collections':
  • Planks: https://acoufelt.com/au/product/woodbequiet/
  • Honeycomb



Visual concept and image links are here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/rfue1vkgohkte0g/AAAc3q32th-27VjlEyphC1J0a?dl=0

Copy for Description and Details:

WoodBeQuiet™ Honeycomb is a series of design-engineered folded tiles that, when combined together, create a 3D wall design. Each tile comes together to deliver a solution that traps sound in it's porous structure. Tiles are available in our five WoodBeQuiet™ prints; Log Cabin, Wine Barrel, Barn Door, Picket Fence and Boat Shed, each designed to appear like a real wood grain.

FYI this does NOT need to include the QuickShip symbol and copy.

Spec sheet and Install guide to come.

If there's any chance we could have this loaded onto the website by tomorrow that would be amazing.

Thanks so much!


Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
